import React from 'react'; import styles from './Settings.module.css'; import { useTheme } from '../../context/ThemeContext'; import { useSettings } from '../../context/SettingsContext'; function Settings({ isOpen, onClose }) { const { isDarkTheme, toggleTheme } = useTheme(); const { settings, toggleSetting } = useSettings(); if (!isOpen) return null; const handleOverlayClick = (e) => { if (e.target === e.currentTarget) { onClose(); } }; return (

Preferences

Active line highlight

Controls whether the editor should highlight the active line

Display line numbers

Controls whether the editor should display line numbers

Scroll past end

Controls whether the editor will add blank space to the end of all files

Markdown preview

Controls whether markdown preview mode is enabled

Dark mode

Controls the application theme

); } export default Settings;
